website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you don't want to spend hundreds more; but unless you need continuous shredding, the 465Ms is a better deal.
pros: Offers continuous shredding for a mid-range price
Has a 16-gallon bin, and other preferred Fellowes features such as jam-proof and safety technology
cons: It only shreds 16 sheets at a time, yet is more than double the price of the 465Ms that shreds 12 sheets at once

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Micro Shredder, Mediocre CD Destruction
customer_reviews.text: This shredder does an excellent job at shredding paper products into oblivion. It runs tirelessly. The noise level is a little higher than I expected, but not terrible. As a bonus, it comes with a small supply of bags and a 12 oz. bottle of shredder oil. It arrived packaged very well in the original box (this thing is HEAVY). It does have a cardboard waste bin which is a little disappointing, but it does appear to be fairly sturdy. Use of the bags would be highly recommended. One small downside I see, is that this shredder does not completely destroy CDs. It merely cuts them into approximately 3/8" wide slivers. All in all, a sturdy and powerful shredder.
customer_reviews.author: The Flying Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: It just works and is the best value for money that I've seen in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Expensive compared to consumer-grade models, but is the least expensive continuous duty model that I could find. Seems to easily shred everything I throw at it, and never stops working -- at least, until the bag is full of confetti and you have to change it out. Don't waste your money on those cheaper units -- they're just cheaper, and they're not worth the money you're spending on them. This one is the one you want to buy, unless you need an even larger heavier-duty model.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Knowles

customer_reviews.title: You want that document to go? It's *Gone*
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yes; I'm back in the shredding business. This thing rocks. Well, I suppose, this thing chews. It's a bit more sensitive to number of sheets than I recall prior Fellowes shredders being, but it just keeps shredding and shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Former Tanker

customer_reviews.title: a compact dynamo of a shredder
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shredder for a small office. We haven't challenged it yet with any major shredding or lengthy workouts, but it's very quiet, pretty compact and makes a great microcut. It should serve our needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous131

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes Powershred 225Mi - great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small office and meets our expectations for a very useful tool. Machine runs quietly. Very pleased with the quality. The only thing I can say negative is that the waste bin should be more durable, not a paper box.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Superb Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder weighs approximately 93 lbs. It microshreds 14+ pages at once. According to Fellowes, the machine should be oiled at least two times per liner bag used and should be run in reverse for about a minute or two. This is a superb shredder, and effortlessly completes heavy duty jobs including CDS and gift cards in a fraction of the time of conventional home shredders. I am very happy with this purchase direct from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenn

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shredder, really powers through the paper and especially the credit card offers in the mail. It is a beast to move up and down stairs so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart H.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I think this shredder is excellent! It meets all our needs. Shreds paper fast and does a clean job!
customer_reviews.author: Lee at UH Maui

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is says. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder works very well! Because of its ability to run continuously and and it's high capacity, I can securely (micro-cut) shred more documents in two hours than I could in a few days with my old shredder. If you do much shredding, this is worth the extra expense!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our office
customer_reviews.text: so far, this shredder is working hard and doing great! In addition, it is so much quieter than the last one we had.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Heisinger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is amazing!!! It is the perfect size for our office and meets all required regualtions!! Definetly a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Collins Dental Associates

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Shredder received damaged with auto feed not working. Contacted Fellowes and they replaced it. The replacement works well for our office
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bowman

customer_reviews.title: They have decided to give you cardboard parts.
customer_reviews.text: in the video, they show you a removable bin on this 1,000 dollar plus shredder.. Its plastic and like other fellows shredders have had. I "upgraded" to this shredder ( a fathers day gift)I and was shocked to see this very expensive shredder has a cardboard bin! UPDATE>> less than two months later, the shredder stopped working.. called fellows and they replaced it..
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: The 125Ci is an excellent model for about 1/2 the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a monster of a shredder. I had a 125Ci and upgraded to his. OMG, it chews up anything you throw at it. The 125Ci is an excellent model for about 1/2 the cost, but this just takes it up a notch. It also has a 9.5 inch opening vs the 125Ci that has a 9 inch paper opening. That allows larger envelopes to fit horizontally in here which is nice. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RK

product_meta.title: Fellowes Powershred 225Mi 100% Jam Proof 16-Sheet Micro-Cut Commercial Grade Paper Shredder (4620001), Black
product_meta.description: The Fellowes Powershred 225Mi Micro-Cut Shredder can shred up to 14 sheets of paper per pass into 2513 (5/64” x 15/32” Security Level P-5) micro-cut particles providing ultimate protection of confidential documents. This machine also safely shreds CDs/DVDs, credit cards, staples, paper clips and junk mail. Achieve hassle-free shredding with all of the features the 225Mi has to offer. Get three levels of advanced jam prevention with Fellowes 100% Jam Proof System which eliminates paper jams, powers through tough jobs and maximizes productivity. To protect more than your identity, the patented SafeSense Technology is designed with an electronic safety sensor that surrounds the paper entry and automatically disables the shredder when hands touch the paper opening. Also, the 225Mi’s SilentShred Technology and Energy Savings System allow this machine to integrate easily to any environment. With the ability to shred continuously, the 225Mi is ideal for 3-5 users and includes a high volume 16-gallon removable basket. Backed by a worry-free 2-year product and service warranty plus a 7-year cutter warranty. 30.75” H x 17.75” W x 17.1” D
feature_bullets: Shreds 16 sheets of paper per pass into 2513 (5/64” x 15/32” Security Level P-5) Micro-Cut particles; shreds staples, credit cards, paper clips, CDs/DVDs, junk mail
Continuous duty motor for non-stop shredding
100% Jam Proof System eliminates paper jams and powers through tough jobs
SafeSense Technology stops shredding when hands touch the paper opening
High volume, 16-gallon removable basket with LED bin-full indicator
This item’s packaging will indicate what is inside and cannot be hidden.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
